original_text: Also, somebody may make a promise by the name of the temple. Then he is making a promise in the name of God, who lives there.
korean_text: 또 성전으로 맹세하는 자는 성전과 그 안에 계신 이로 맹세함이요

sentences.original_text: Also, somebody may make a promise
sentences.korean_translation: 또한, 누군가 약속을 할 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: by the name of the temple.
Then he is making a promise
